body:
These new properties are handled exactly as the `headers` and `libs` properties. The default handlers simply combine the `headers` and `libs` properties of all link dependencies, similar to how the `rpath` package property works.

I will add another PR that uses (and illustrates) these new properties in the `mfem` package and some of its dependencies.

Edit: the other PR is #7257.
title: Introduce new properties: 'all_headers' and 'all_libs'
